@graph.name: One Pan Mexican Quinoa - Vegan Heaven
@graph.description: This vegan one pan Mexican quinoa with black beans and corn is one of my favorite vegan weeknight dinners! It's so easy to make and incredibly healthy!

@graph.headline: One Pan Mexican Quinoa
@graph.keywords: Mexican one pot quinoa,Mexican quinoa,one pan Mexican quinoa,one pot quinoa,one pot quinoa vegan,vegan one pot quinoa,vegan quinoa recipe,vegan quinoa recipes

@graph.name: One Pan Mexican Quinoa
@graph.description: This vegan one pot Mexican quinoa with black beans and corn is one of my favorite vegan weeknight dinners! It's super easy to make, incredibly healthy, and so delicious. Plus, it's packed with protein! Serve it with fresh parsley and avocado for an extra boost of nutrients.
recipeIngredient: 2  bell peppers, chopped (I used an orange and a red one)
1 15 oz can black beans, drained and rinsed

recipeInstructions.text: Heat some oil in a large pot or pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the garlic and the bell pepper and cook for another 2 minutes on high heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat some oil in a large pot or pan and sauté the onion for 2-3 minutes or until it becomes translucent. Then add the garlic and the bell pepper and cook for another 2 minutes on high heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the rest of the ingredients except for the lime juice, the green onions, and the parsley.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the rest of the ingredients except for the lime juice, the green onions, and the parsley.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover with a lid and cook for 20 minutes. As the temperature varies a bit, make sure to check once in a while that your quinoa is not burning or sticking to the bottom of the pan by stirring with a wooden spoon. If so, lower the heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover with a lid and cook for 20 minutes. As the temperature varies a bit, make sure to check once in a while that your quinoa is not burning or sticking to the bottom of the pan by stirring with a wooden spoon. If so, lower the heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Then stir in the lime juice, the green onions, the parsley and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Serve with avocado on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Then stir in the lime juice, the green onions, the parsley and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes. Serve with avocado on top.
